ygData.subject: Re: Boat problems
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Now why didn t I think of looking for a dock? Thanks Roop, you ve saved my bacon and probably maxed my swimming skill at the same time :) Zendarin The
ygData.messageBody:
>Memorize the Jig O Vigor and start peddling! I've swum from just that very
>spot, drunk and fell overboard myself. Best start swimming, hit autorun
>and
>sit back and eat some raman. Perhaps you'll get lucky and someone will
>come
>to hunt there. Try calling out to people to get the LOC of a dock, then
>head for it. Now truthfully, you shouldn't be that far from the first dock
>at all. Unless you swim past it.


Now why didn't I think of looking for a dock? Thanks Roop, you've saved my
bacon and probably maxed my swimming skill at the same time :)

Zendarin
The Wandering Minstrel
Fennin Ro
